document.full_text: former unicef boss ann veneman should refuse a seat on the board of nestle because the food giant violates a global code on marketing of breast milk substitutes, nutrition campaign groups said on wednesday.
document.title: uproar at ex-unicef boss joining nestle board
lines_and_colors: former unicef boss ann veneman should refuse a seat on the board of nestle because the food giant violates a global code on marketing of breast milk substitutes, nutrition campaign groups said on wednesday.
